Sentencas: Hybrid gas turbine-fuel cell systems have immense potential for high efficiency in electrical power generation with cleaner emissions compared with fossil-fueled power generation.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: A systematic controlled variable (CV) selection method is deployed for a hybrid gas turbine-fuel cell system in the HyPer (hybrid performance) facility at the U.S. Department of Energy's National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL) for maximizing its economic and control performance.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: A three-stage approach is used for the CV selection comprising a priori analysis, multiobjective optimization, and a posteriori analysis.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: The a priori analysis helps to screen off several candidate CVs, thus reducing the size of the combinatorial optimization problem for multiobjective CV selection.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: For optimal CV selection, a transfer function model of the HyPer facility is identified.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: By considering several candidate models, the final transfer function model is selected using Akaike's Final Prediction Error criterion.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: Experimental data from the HyPer facility are used to estimate the noise in the measurement data.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: For solving the combinatorial multiobjective optimization problem for CV selection, a multiagent optimization platform comprising simulated annealing, genetic algorithm, and efficient ant colony optimization algorithms is used.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: Pareto-optimal CV sets exhibit a high trade-off between the economic and control objective.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: The a posteriori analysis is undertaken for several top Pareto-optimal CV sets.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform

Sentencas: An optimal CV set is selected that shows the best compromise between process economics and controllability under both nominal and off-design conditions.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimal Controlled Variable Selection for a Gas Turbine-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Using a Multiagent Optimization Platform
